## ControlFieldOverrides type

Represents an object of configurable properties on TControl, allowing form state selectors.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ControlFieldOverrides<TForm extends object, TInputState extends object, TControl extends ControlFieldSchema<any, any>> = Partial<ControlFieldOverridables<TForm, TInputState, Partial<GetViewOptionsFromControl<TControl>>>>;
```
<b>References:</b> [ControlFieldSchema](./dynamic-forms.controlfieldschema.md)<!-- -->, [ControlFieldOverridables](./dynamic-forms.controlfieldoverridables.md)<!-- -->, [GetViewOptionsFromControl](./dynamic-forms.getviewoptionsfromcontrol.md)
